dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.connectSoundcloudDesc: To access your SoundCloud dashboard, you must first connect your SoundCloud account.
dashboard.automationDesc: Enable automation for your SoundCloud account
dashboard.tokenRequired: Token must be valid to enable automation
dashboard.disconnectDesc: This action will disconnect your account from our platform and suspend all automations.
dashboard.welcomeDesc: Connect your music platforms to start managing your presence and automating your growth.
dashboard.platformComingSoon: This platform will be available soon. Stay tuned!

soundcloudPage.title: SoundCloud Configuration
soundcloudPage.notConnectedWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è You must be connected to SoundCloud to configure your settings.
soundcloudPage.notConnectedDesc: Connect from the Dashboard page to enable all features.
soundcloudPage.engageQualifiedFanbaseDesc: Automatically engage with people who listen to similar styles to develop your audience.
soundcloudPage.followTrendDesc: Discover and automatically repost the best tracks that match your preferred music styles.
soundcloudPage.connectWithPeersDesc: Establish connections with the most promising artists who share your musical tastes to build a professional network.
soundcloudPage.mustBeConnected: You must be connected to SoundCloud to enable this feature
soundcloudPage.mustBeConnectedComments: You must be connected to SoundCloud to save your comments
soundcloudPage.stylesPlaceholder: Ex: Electronic, Hip-Hop, Rock... (Press Enter or type a comma to add)
soundcloudPage.stylesTip: üí° Tip: Enter the music styles that define you to reach as many people as possible. You can enter up to 3 different styles. Press Enter or type a comma to add a style.
soundcloudPage.mustBeConnectedStyles: You must be connected to SoundCloud to save your styles
soundcloudPage.atLeastOneStyle: Please enter at least one style
soundcloudPage.maxThreeStyles: You cannot enter more than 3 styles
soundcloudPage.maxFollowing: Maximum number of people to follow
soundcloudPage.maxFollowingDesc: Set the maximum number of people you want to follow. Your account will be synced daily to respect this limit.
soundcloudPage.securityWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Security: A maximum of 100 people per day will be unfollowed to avoid blocks.
soundcloudPage.mustBeConnectedFollowLimit: You must be connected to SoundCloud to save the follow limit

home.title:
Origin
of your evolution
home.description: Kaitos is the French AI agency that helps companies integrate artificial intelligence as a strategic transformation axis, with method, follow-up and long-term vision.

music.title:
Manage your
SoundCloud accounts in one click
music.description: A private dashboard allowing labels and artists to connect their SoundCloud accounts, view analytics, schedule publications and manage multiple profiles from a centralized interface.
music.sectionTitle: SoundCloud Label Manager: your management tool
music.sectionDescription: An internal tool developed by Kaitos to help music labels and artists efficiently manage their multiple SoundCloud accounts with automation, analytics and optimized workflows.

forLabels.title: For music labels
forLabels.description: Simplify the management of your multiple SoundCloud accounts from a single interface. Centralize your operations, automate your workflows and optimize your presence on the platform.

forArtists.title: For artists
forArtists.description: Efficiently manage your SoundCloud presence with professional tools. Track your performance, schedule your releases and optimize your content strategy.

features.title: Key features
features.description: Our tool offers all the features needed for professional management of your SoundCloud accounts, with automation and advanced insights.

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: Automate your publication and content management workflows. Schedule your uploads, manage your metadata and optimize your repetitive processes.

analytics.title: Analytics & Insights
analytics.description: Access detailed and consolidated analytics for all your accounts. Visualize your performance, identify trends and make informed decisions.

workflow.title: Publication workflow
workflow.description: Plan and schedule your publications with an optimized workflow. Manage your metadata, tags and descriptions from a centralized interface.

multiAccount.title: Multi-account management
multiAccount.description: Connect and manage multiple SoundCloud accounts from a single dashboard. Easily switch between your different profiles and centralize your operations.

about.title: A tool in development
about.paragraph1: SoundCloud Label Manager is currently in prototype phase. This tool is developed internally by Kaitos for our partner clients in the music industry.
about.paragraph2: The application is not public and will only be used internally by labels and artists we work with directly. We are developing this tool to meet specific needs for managing multiple SoundCloud accounts.
about.paragraph3: SoundCloud API Access: We have requested access to SoundCloud's closed API to develop the advanced features needed for this tool, including OAuth authentication and extended account management endpoints.

ctaSection.title: Interested in this tool?
ctaSection.description: If you are a label or artist working with Kaitos and would like to learn more about this tool or request access, contact us for more information.
